hero.subtitle: Transforming system development from 'designing for humans' to 'designing for AI' - a fundamental paradigm shift for the AI era.
hero.paradigmShift: A fundamental paradigm shift for the AI era

contextual.title: Contextual Awareness
contextual.description: Providing AI with appropriate contextual environments. Building effective context is key to improving AI generation accuracy through text-based inputs.

autonomous.title: Autonomous Execution
autonomous.description: Providing AI with appropriate toolchains. AI excels with command-line tools and prefers text-based logging information for direct development participation.

selfIteration.title: Self-Iteration Capability
selfIteration.description: Maintaining project state synchronization and tool adaptation. Continuously updating capabilities as projects evolve to ensure sustained effectiveness.

human.title: Human-Centric Design
human.point1: Designed for human usability and comprehension
human.point2: Human-driven decision making at every step
human.description: Traditional system design focuses on human interaction experiences, meeting user needs through graphical interfaces and visual operations.

ai.title: AI-Centric Design
ai.point1: Optimized for AI comprehension and processing
ai.description: In the new paradigm, systems prioritize AI comprehension and processing efficiency, maximizing AI capabilities through text interfaces and structured data.

transition.title: Paradigm Shift
transition.description: The AI era requires fundamentally rethinking system design, shifting from human usage to AI understanding and execution.

methodology.title: AI-First Development Framework
methodology.description: ASDM represents a fundamental paradigm shift from human-centric to AI-centric development, where AI assumes responsibility for most output tasks while humans guide and make critical decisions.

step1.title: Value Creation Shift
step1.description: Transform from human-only to 'AI + Human' collaboration where majority of deliverables are AI-generated.

step2.title: Capability Architecture
step2.description: Establish foundational capabilities that support scenario-specific tools across the software lifecycle.

step3.title: AI-Enabled Scenarios
step3.description: Deploy AI tools for specific tasks like writing requirements, generating code, designing tests, and code reviews.

cta.title: Ready to Transform?
cta.description: Join the AI-first development revolution and be part of the community shaping the future of system development.

community.title: Join Our Community
community.description: Join our growing community of developers and organizations adopting AI-first development methodologies. Share experiences and shape the future of AI-powered system development.
